verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of two <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> that <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H2492>dreamed:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the <S%H2975>river.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H5927>came<s%> up out of the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3303>well<s%> <S%H4758>favored<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> and <S%H1277>fat;<s%> and they <S%H7462>fed<s%> in a <S%H260>meadow.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> them out of the <S%H2975>river,<s%> <S%H7451>ill<s%> <S%H4758>favored<s%> and <S%H1851>skinney;<s%> <S%H1320><s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the other <S%H6510>cows<s%> on the <S%H8193>brink<s%> of the <S%H2975>river.<s%>

And the <S%H7451>ill<s%> <S%H4758>favored<s%> and <S%H1851>skinney<s%> <S%H1320><s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> up the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3303>well<s%> <S%H4758>favored<s%> and <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H6510>cows.<s%> So <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3364>awoke.<s%>

And he <S%H3462>slept<s%> and <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> time: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> of corn <S%H5927>came<s%> up on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>stalk,<s%> <S%H1277>rank<s%> and <S%H2896>good.<s%>
And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> and <S%H7710>blasted<s%> with the <S%H6921>east<s%> wind <S%H6779>sprung<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> them.

And the seven <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> <S%H1104>devoured<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1277>rank<s%> and <S%H4392>full<s%> <S%H7641>ears.<s%> And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3364>awoke,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was a <S%H2472>dream.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> that his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H6470>troubled;<s%> and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> men thereof: and <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> them his <S%H2472>dream;<s%> but there was <S%H369>none<s%> that could <S%H6622>interpret<s%> them to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>
Then <S%H1696>spoke<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H4945>butler<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I do <S%H2142>remember<s%> my <S%H2399>faults<s%> this <S%H3117>day:<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> me in <S%H4929>ward<s%> in the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> both me and the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker:<s%>

And we <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> I and he; we <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> each <S%H376>man<s%> according to the <S%H6623>interpretation<s%> of his <S%H2472>dream.<s%>

And <S%H8033>there<s%> was there with us a <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> an <S%H5680>Hebrew,<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> to the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard;<s%> and we <S%H5608>told<s%> him, and he <S%H6622>interpreted<s%> to us our <S%H2472>dreams;<s%> to each <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H2472>dream<s%> he did <S%H6622>interpret.<s%>
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, as he <S%H6622>interpreted<s%> to us, <S%H3651>so<s%> it was; me he <S%H7725>restored<s%> to my <S%H3653>office,<s%> and him he <S%H8518>hanged.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and they <S%H7323>brought<s%> him <S%H7323>hastily<s%> out of the <S%H953>dungeon:<s%> and he <S%H1548>shaved<s%> himself, and <S%H2498>changed<s%> his <S%H8071>raiment,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> in to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> I have <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and there is <S%H369>none<s%> that can <S%H6622>interpret<s%> it: and I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> of you, that you can <S%H8085>understand<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> to <S%H6622>interpret<s%> it.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> It is not in me: <S%H430>God<s%> shall give <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> an <S%H6030>answer<s%> of <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> In my <S%H2472>dream,<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H2975>river:<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H5927>came<s%> up out of the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6510>cows,<s%> <S%H1277>fat<s%> and <S%H3303>well<s%> <S%H8389>favored;<s%> and they <S%H7462>fed<s%> in a <S%H260>meadow:<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> them, <S%H1800>poor<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7451>ill<s%> <S%H8389>favored<s%> and <S%H7534>skinney,<s%> <S%H2007>such<s%> as I <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H7455>badness:<s%>
And the <S%H7534>lean<s%> and the <S%H7451>ill<s%> favored <S%H6510>cows<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> up the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H6510>cows:<s%>

And when they had <S%H935>eaten<s%> them up, it could not be <S%H3045>known<s%> that they had <S%H935>eaten<s%> them; but they were still <S%H7451>ill<s%> favored, as at the <S%H8462>beginning.<s%> So I <S%H3364>awoke.<s%>

And I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in my <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>stalk,<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> and <S%H2896>good:<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7641>ears,<s%> <S%H6798>withered,<s%> <S%H1851>thin,<s%> and <S%H7710>blasted<s%> with the <S%H6921>east<s%> wind, <S%H6779>sprung<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> them:

And the <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> <S%H1104>devoured<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7641>ears:<s%> and I <S%H559>told<s%> this to the <S%H2748>magicians;<s%> but there was <S%H369>none<s%> that could <S%H5046>declare<s%> it to me.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> The <S%H2472>dream<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> is <S%H259>one:<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5046>showed<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> he is about to <S%H6213>do.<s%>

The <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> and the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> the <S%H2472>dream<s%> is <S%H259>one.<s%>

And the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7534>thin<s%> and <S%H7451>ill<s%> favored <S%H6510>cows<s%> that <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> them are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> and the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7386>empty<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> <S%H7710>blasted<s%> with the <S%H6921>east<s%> wind shall be <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine.<s%>

<S%H1931>This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> <S%H834>What<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is about to <S%H6213>do<s%> he <S%H7200>shows<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> there <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7647>plenty<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%>

And there shall <S%H6965>arise<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7647>plenty<s%> shall be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H7458>famine<s%> shall <S%H3615>consume<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%>

And the <S%H7647>plenty<s%> shall not be <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of that <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H310>following;<s%> <S%H3651><s%> for it shall be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>grievous.<s%>

And for that the <S%H2472>dream<s%> was <S%H8138>doubled<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6471>twice;<s%> it is <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H1697>thing<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> by <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H4116>shortly<s%> <S%H6213>bring<s%> it to <S%H6213>pass.<s%>

Now therefore let <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> out a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H995>discreet<s%> and <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and <S%H7896>set<s%> him <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Let <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> this, and let him <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H6496>officers<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and take up the <S%H2567>fifth<s%> part of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7647>plenteous<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And let them <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H400>food<s%> of <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> that <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H6651>lay<s%> up <S%H1250>corn<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and let them <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H400>food<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And that <S%H400>food<s%> shall be for <S%H6487>store<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> against the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall be in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> that the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3772>perish<s%> not through the <S%H7458>famine.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H3190>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> Can we <S%H4672>find<s%> such a one as <S%H2088>this<s%> is, a <S%H376>man<s%> in <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is?

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> For as <S%H310>much<s%> as <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H3045>showed<s%> you <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> so <S%H995>discreet<s%> and <S%H2450>wise<s%> as you are:

You shall be <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5921>according<s%> to your <S%H6310>word<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> be <S%H5401>ruled:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> in the <S%H3678>throne<s%> will I be <S%H1431>greater<s%> than you.
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> you <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5493>took<s%> off his <S%H2885>ring<s%> from his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3847>arrayed<s%> him in <S%H899>clothing<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H7242>chain<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> his <S%H6677>neck;<s%>

And he made him to <S%H7392>ride<s%> in the <S%H4932>second<s%> <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had; and they <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, <S%H86>Bow<s%> the knee: and he <S%H5414>made<s%> him ruler <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> I am <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H1107>without<s%> you shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7311>lift<s%> up his <S%H3027>hand<s%> or <S%H7272>foot<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6847>Zaphnathpaaneah;<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him to <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H621>Asenath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6319>Potipherah<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H204>On.<s%> And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H5921>over<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H5674>went<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
And in the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7647>plenteous<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6213>brought<s%> <S%H6213>forth<s%> by <S%H7062>handfuls.<s%>

And he <S%H6908>gathered<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H400>food<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H5414>laid<s%> up the <S%H400>food<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities:<s%> the <S%H400>food<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5439>round<s%> about every <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H5414>laid<s%> he up in the same.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6651>gathered<s%> <S%H1250>corn<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H2308>left<s%> <S%H5608>numbering;<s%> for it was <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4557>number.<s%>

And to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H621>Asenath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6319>Potipherah<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H204>On<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> to him.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh:<s%> For <S%H430>God,<s%> said he, has made me <S%H5382>forget<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5999>toil,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
